page.title: 01Gunton and its Environs
page.content: Gunton Park is situated in North Norfolk six miles from the popular sea- side town of Cromer. Once part of the thriving estate ,seat of the Harbords, Lord Suffield.The large park,now under cultivation,with its two lakes and impressive gateways is surrounded by mixed woodland and good quality farmland. Farms and cottages are scattered,and several miles from schools,hospitals, churches and shopping centres.Gunton Estate,in its heyday,was a popular Royal holiday haunt.However,at the end of the 19th century due to massive over-spending and extravagant entertaining a rapid decline set in.The Hall, park and Estate farms were sold in 1980. The owner of the Hall and Park has since restored them to there original style.They now lie within a conservation area of great beauty.
